doc.title: Occupied
doc.plot: A mysterious woman is waiting at the airport. At a coffee shop a dealer hands over a small parcel to her, that she smuggles onto the passenger plane that she boards a short while later. The plane takes off. She has smuggled everything she needs to fulfill her intents. Nobody noticed anything. She sets off. All moves have been carefully studied, the mission begins, her goal is clearly within reach. She locks herself into the toilet, seals the door with tape, unfolds a cabling plan of the plane, and starts cutting wires running in the ceiling overhead. What is her intention?
